snippet: “Dancing Around the Bride,” at the Philadelphia Museum of Art, looks at how Cage, Cunningham, Johns and Rauschenberg developed their resistance movement from the art of Marcel Duchamp.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews Dancing Around the Bride exhibition, examining how Cage, Cunningham, Johns and Rauschenberg developed their resistance movement from the art of Marcel Duchamp, at the Philadelphia Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: “Dancing Around the Bride,” at the Philadelphia Museum of Art, looks at how Cage, Cunningham, Johns and Rauschenberg developed their resistance movement from the art of Marcel Duchamp.

headline.seo: ‘Dancing Around the Bride,’ at Philadelphia Museum of Art
headline.main: A Sun’s Influence on a Galaxy of Stars
